name: arjun
install: git clone https://github.com/s0md3v/Arjun.git tools/Arjun && ln -s $(pwd)/tools/Arjun/arjun.py bin/arjun

name: tplmap
install: git clone https://github.com/epinna/tplmap.git tools/tplmap && ln -s $(pwd)/tools/tplmap/tplmap.py bin/tplmap

name: gf
install: go install github.com/tomnomnom/gf@latest && git clone https://github.com/1ndianl33t/Gf-Patterns tools/Gf-Patterns && mkdir -p ~/.gf && cp tools/Gf-Patterns/*.json ~/.gf/
